hero.title: Less Time Scheduling,
hero.subtitle: More Time Shepherding.
hero.description: The scheduling tool that returns your focus to ministry and strengthens genuine connection with your community. Stop the back-and-forth of messages and calls.
hero.socialProof: Join over 10,000 pastors who trust PastorAgenda.

problem.title: Does your ministerial schedule feel like a puzzle?
problem.description: Between preparing sermons, leading meetings, visiting the sick, and caring for your own family, managing counseling requests and schedules can become a second job.
problems: WhatsApp messages and calls at any hour to schedule an appointment?
Fear of double-booking or forgetting to follow up?
Difficulty protecting your rest time and family time?
Feeling like you're not as available to your church as you'd like to be?
problem.solution: It's time to stop managing chaos and start leading with peace.

growth.title: Cultivate Natural Growth in Your Church
growth.message: Stop fighting for numbers and start cultivating health. Release the growth potential that God has already planted in your church, focusing on quality that generates quantity naturally.

features.title: Everything you need for a more organized and present ministry
features.subtitle: PastorAgenda isn't just a calendar. It's your personal assistant that works 24/7 to protect your time and facilitate caring for your flock.
features.description: PastorAgenda provides a comprehensive solution for religious leaders to manage appointments, share their availability, and connect with their community.

feature1.title: Take Back Control of Your Time
feature1.subtitle: Smart Availability
feature1.description: Set your counseling, visitation, and meeting hours once. PastorAgenda handles the rest, showing your community only the times when you're truly available. No more unexpected interruptions.

feature2.title: Be Present for Your Community, Effortlessly
feature2.subtitle: Community Connection
feature2.description: Share a single link in your church group, status, or website. Any member can see your availability and book an appointment with just a few clicks, simply and respectfully.

feature3.title: A Professional Scheduling Process
feature3.subtitle: Easy and Customized Scheduling
feature3.description: Create different types of schedules (counseling, visitation, pre-marriage) with specific durations. The system sends automatic notifications, reducing no-shows and showing a level of organization and care.

feature4.title: Conversations with Trust and Privacy
feature4.subtitle: Secure and Private
feature4.description: Counseling is a sacred moment. Our platform was built with security and privacy in mind, ensuring that data and the nature of appointments are kept in complete confidentiality.

preview.title: See How Your Appointment Page Will Look
preview.description: This is exactly how your community will see and interact with your appointment page. A clean, professional interface that makes booking appointments simple and respectful.
preview.subtitle: Your members can easily see your availability, book appointments, and you'll receive all the details automatically.

cta.title: Ready to focus on what really matters?
cta.subtitle: Let technology take care of your schedule so you can take care of people. Free your time, organize your ministry, and strengthen your bonds with the community.
cta.description: Start managing your ministry appointments with ease and connect with your community.

faq1.question: How do I set up my pastor profile?
faq1.answer: After signing up, go to your dashboard and complete your profile with your name, bio, and profile picture. This helps your community recognize you.

faq2.question: How do I share my booking link?
faq2.answer: You can share your public profile link directly, or use the QR code feature. You can also create time-limited sharing links for specific events.

faq3.question: Can I change my availability?
faq3.answer: Yes! Go to your dashboard and use the availability settings to block out times when you're not available for appointments.

faq4.question: How do I cancel an appointment?
faq4.answer: Both you and your community members can cancel appointments. Use the cancel link in confirmation emails or manage bookings from your dashboard.
